text: Lougres () is a commune in the Doubs department in Bourgogne-Franche-Comté in eastern France. ==Geography== Lougres is southwest of Montbéliard. The commune takes its name from the stream that runs through it, from its source to the river Doubs. ==Population== ==Related pages== * Communes of the Doubs department ==References== ==Other websites== * Lougres on the intercommunal Web site of the department Category:Communes in Doubs
title: Lougres
